Join.Name: 結合

Apply.Name: 分類モデルの適用
Apply.SQLExpression: "N$10105" as (SELECT "TIME_SERIAL", PREDICTION("CLAS_SVM_1_5" USING *) "CLAS_SVM_1_4_PRED", PREDICTION_PROBABILITY("CLAS_SVM_1_5" USING *) "CLAS_SVM_1_4_PROB" FROM {INPUT_SOURCE} )

Apply.Name: 異常モデルの適用
Apply.SQLExpression: "N$10115" as (SELECT "TIME_SERIAL", PREDICTION("ANOM_SVM_1_5" USING *) "ANOM_SVM_1_5_PRED", PREDICTION_PROBABILITY("ANOM_SVM_1_5" USING *) "ANOM_SVM_1_5_PROB" FROM {INPUT_SOURCE} )
